verses.name: Leviticus 4:31
verses.text: And he shall take away all the fat thereof, as the fat is taken away from off the sacrifice of peace offerings; and the priest shall burn it upon the altar for a sweet savour unto the Lord; and the priest shall make an atonement for him, and it shall be forgiven him.

verses.name: Leviticus 4:32
verses.text: And if he bring a lamb for a sin offering, he shall bring it a female without blemish.

verses.name: Leviticus 4:33
verses.text: And he shall lay his hand upon the head of the sin offering, and slay it for a sin offering in the place where they kill the burnt offering.
